section.title: Behavior
section.para: Functions can be recursive; that is, the name of a function may be used in its own body.
A set of functions may be mutually recursive by naming each other in their bodies. There is no special keyword for mutual recursion.

example.title: Simple example of a recursive function
example.programlisting: def sumto(n) = if n < 1 then 0 else n + sumto(n-1)
